mapper.select: SELECT ifnull(max(fb_num),0) FROM freeBoard WHERE title = #{title} and content = #{content} and id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeBoard (fb_num, title, content, regDate, hit, id) VALUES((select ifnull(max(f.fb_num),0)+1 from freeBoard f), #{title}, #{content}, #{regDate}, #{hit}, #{id})
mapper.update: UPDATE freeBoard SET content = #{content} WHERE fb_num = {fb_num}
